title: Average prices of Gleevec - selected countries 2013
summary: In 2013 , United_States – with 6214 million dollars of Price U.S. exported to Gleevec - was the main supplier of this fuel .
In the same year , Gleevec imported 3633 million dollars of Price U.S. from Switzerland and 3348 million dollars from Spain .
Overall , the volume of Price U.S. imported from United_States oscillated throughout the past years , even though it was quite steady from 2014 to 2017 .
gold: This statistic displays the average prices of Gleevec in 2013 in selected countries . In that year , the price of Gleevec averaged 3,321 U.S. dollars in the Netherlands . Gleevec is a prescription drug used to treat some types of cancers , including some types of leukemia .
